CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.6)

SET ( THIRDPARTYBOOSTTHREADPOOLDETAILINCLUDES
	future.hpp
	locking_ptr.hpp
	pool_core.hpp
	scope_guard.hpp
	worker_thread.hpp
)

INSTALL ( FILES ${THIRDPARTYBOOSTTHREADPOOLDETAILINCLUDES} DESTINATION include/thirdparty/boost/threadpool/detail
	PERMISSIONS
	OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE
	GROUP_READ
	WORLD_READ
)
